name: Elf
description: Elves are wild humanoids, distinguishable by their long, pointed ears and skin tones which range from light blue to dark green. They typically live hard, long lives in small settlements in the most dangerous of the Fonteran jungles as a result of their displacement from their wars with the Orcs.

options.name: Medium
options.description: Elves are medium-sized creatures and suffer no penalty or benefits.

options.name: Keydaran Blood
options.description: The blood of the first Keyadar runs through the Elves, granting them +1 skill with resilience. They are also immune to effects that would prematurely age them.

options.name: Action : Nebulous Eyes
options.description: Your eyes glow with the power of the cosmos, allowing you to focus and improve your vision capabilities. While you maintain your concentration, you have darksight in a moderate (20 unit) distance.

options.name: Born of Starlight
options.description: The power of the celestials flows through your veins, making you especially susceptible to the dark forces of the world. You suffer a -3 penalty to dark mitigation.
